mapper.select: SELECT order_seq AS orderSeq, business_num AS businessNum, business_company AS businessCompany, business_name AS businessName, business_addr AS businessAddr, business_cate AS businessCate, business_item AS businessItem, request_email AS requestEmail, request_name AS requestName, request_cell AS requestCell, request_date AS requestDate, request_flag AS requestFlag, complete_date AS completeDate FROM sm_order_tax_request WHERE order_seq=#{value}
mapper.update: INSERT INTO sm_order_tax_request ( order_seq, business_num, business_company, business_name, business_addr, business_cate, business_item, request_email, request_name, request_cell, request_date, request_flag ) VALUES ( #{orderSeq}, #{businessNum}, #{businessCompany}, #{businessName}, #{businessAddr}, #{businessCate}, #{businessItem}, #{requestEmail}, #{requestName}, #{requestCell}, now(), 'N' ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE order_seq=#{orderSeq}, business_num=#{businessNum}, business_company=#{businessCompany}, business_name=#{businessName}, business_addr=#{businessAddr}, business_cate=#{businessCate}, business_item=#{businessItem}, request_email=#{requestEmail}, request_name=#{requestName}, request_cell=#{requestCell}
UPDATE sm_order_tax_request SET complete_date=now(), request_flag='Y' WHERE order_seq=#{value}
